snippet: The Modern Language Association took a step toward approving a resolution to oppose what it called Israel’s discriminatory “denials of entry” to scholars trying to visit the West Bank.
abstract: Movement to pressure and isolate Israel gains further ground among American academics, when Modern Language Assn takes a step toward approving a resolution calling on State Department to contest what it characterizes as Israel’s discriminatory 'denials of entry' to American scholars seeking to visit the West Bank to work at Palestinian universities.
lead_paragraph: The Modern Language Association took a step toward approving a resolution to oppose what it called Israel’s discriminatory “denials of entry” to scholars trying to visit the West Bank.

headline.main: Another Academic Group Considers Israel Censure
headline.print_headline: Another Academic Group Considers Israel Censure
